bio: Computational Neuroscience Ph.D., founder of WTF Academy, initiator of ETH Beijing Hackathon and ETH Hangzhou Hackathon.
contributionDescription:
1. WTF Solidity tutorials: concise, community-reviewed, open-source tutorials for Solidity in Chinese and English. 80+ chapters, 100+ contributors, 8,400+ stars.
2. WTF Ethers tutorials: concise, community-reviewed, open-source tutorials for Ethersjs in Chinese and English. 20+ chapters, 30+ contributors, 2,100+ stars.
3. wtf.academy: Decentralized education platform for web3 developers. Learn, test, and get certificates: 7,000+ registered users, 20,000 monthly active users.
4. WTF EVM Opcodes: The most comprehensive tutorial for EVM opcodes, covering all the 144 opcodes on EVM.

contributionLinks.description: concise, community-reviewed, open-source tutorials for Solidity. 8,400+ stars!
concise, community-reviewed, open-source tutorials for Ethers.js. 2,100+ stars!
We will launch WTF on-chain certificates on optimism by the end of 2023.
Decentralized education platform for developers. Learn, test, get certificates.
EVM opcodes tutorials, covering all the 144 opcodes on evm.
WTF Solidity gas optimization techniques, verified with Foundry.
We hosted ETH Beijing hackathon in Beijing, China, April 2023.
We hosted ETH Hangzhou hackathon in Hangzhou, China, October 2023.

impactDescription:
1. Optimism shares the same developer stack with Ethereum. We have created one of the most impactful open-source tutorials in Solidity, Ethers.js, and more in Chinese and English. All the optimism developers will benefit from them.
2. We will launch on-chain certificates on optimism, bringing massive developers to the optimism collective.
3. We hosted 2 IRL Ethereum hackathons in China, bringing the optimism vibe to Chinese web3 developers.
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged because it promises future impact that violates the first rule - "We will launch WTF on-chain certificates on optimism by the end of 2023.".
pwCategorySuggestions: Blockchain Education, Developer Ecosystem, Community Building
